name: Block Crush - Travel Master
description:
Solve block puzzles and embark on an exciting and magical journey in Block Crush!
In this block puzzle game, we have no time limit, you can fully enjoy the block puzzle and challenge hundreds of travel levels. Block Crush is also a completely free game, simple and easy to play, to help you feel refreshed, and a wealth of achievements to unlock.

How to play :
- Choose and drag the block into the 8×8 board.
- Fill the block with a row or column to remove them.
- Game over if no room for extra blocks.

Features :
- No time limit, and completely free game to play.
- No wifi needed, enioy block game anytime.
- Marvelous brain games & great time killer.

If you’re looking for a block puzzle game with a lot more distinctive then you have found it! We have added unique and innovative gameplay on the basis of the classic building block puzzle game, aiming to provide the best free games for you.
